projects.title: HackerRank Regex in Python
projects.description: Solved Regular Expression problems and algorithms using Python language in HackerRank online platform

projects.title: E Polling Project
projects.description: We made an online Electronic Polling Platform which uses networking concepts such as Sockets, client-server connection, TCP/IP etc.

projects.title: Introduction to backend Development
projects.description: In this module, you will learn about the different types of web developers and the roles and responsibilities of front-end, back-end, and full-stack developers. You will take a first look at the core technologies of HTML, CSS, and Javascript and explore the concepts that underpin how the internet works.
